column4: I have a question about running older versions of ubuntu like edgy eft can you still do it ?
you could install them from their ISOs but there wouldn't be updates / repositories for you to add software with... kinda useless really
audacious is "almost" the same as xmms was
oh i used to use it all the time (for years)
and i don't like xmms2 at all
have you tried bmpx?  i haven't, but its also suppose to be similar accorting to !xmms
you have one very specific requirement there!
hey xmms did this on its own with all my wav and .flac files
i hope you find a suitable alternative
? no idea -- i doubt it, if it's in ubuntu usually mean i can run on any linux
OH YA - that's probably what it is!
^ that's where i got it from
if you're using Lenny, why are you here?  wouldn't #debian be a better place?
i search in ubuntu's repo it isn't here either
good luck man - i'm off to watch some TV for a while, hope you find a solution/alternative - or get XMMS going ;)  take care man
